subject: Good day
body:
Good day
I am Eng. Paul Macdonald, I represent a group of investors who are looking for projects to fund, we offer both corporate and personal loans.  Come with your ideas, let's build a solid wall in the financial sector and be able to make the sector viable for all.
We offer loans at 3% interest rate almost at nothing as we believe in Consistency driven policy.
Wishes to connect with startups and entrepreneurs with viable projects that require instant loan/Investment to fund their project. We can comfortably provide loans depending on the viability of the project.
Apply today and be able to access your loan within a short period of time. Note that, we also pay 1% commission to brokers/agents, who introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities, we would be delighted to work with you.
You can reply me on this telephone number
 
paulmacdonald1171@gmail.com
Looking forward to your response
Thank you
Eng Paul Macdonald

subject: Re: Good day
body:
Hello Eng. Paul Macdonald,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this opportunity. I'm always interested in learning about potential investments and funding options. Could you please provide more details about the types of projects your group of investors is interested in? What are the criteria for a project to be considered viable?

Additionally, could you explain more about the interest rates you mentioned? How is it possible to offer loans at such low rates? Are there any specific terms or conditions that borrowers should be aware of?

Lastly, I appreciate your mention of paying commission to brokers or agents who introduce project owners. Could you elaborate on how that process works?

Thank you again for your message, and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Marion

Thanks for your email and your interest in our loan offer. Apology for my
late response. I was indisposed

Like I told you in my previous proposal we are a Creative Business
Consulting company offering Corporate and Personal Loan. We offer all kinds
of financial assistance to every individual "Business loan and Personal
loan, for investment, debt consolidation and house purchase etc." We will
be willing to offer you the loan if actually you are interested in the
loan.

Note that we have no particular preference for any project. What we are
interested is the viability of the project and there must be political and
economic stability in the country where the project is located. Any project
that has good return on investment will be considered. The 1% commission
for a broker is one time pay off of the total value of the loan upon the
release of the money to the borrower. A memorandum of Understanding will be
drafted to this effect to protect the broker's interest.

Procedures to apply for the loan

You have to submit your project implementation with the amount you need as
loan to the investors for review. Once your project is approved by the
investors we will send to you a loan expression of interest form to fill
and return to us. As soon as this is done, our legal department will
prepare a loan agreement for you to fill and return to us. After this, a
meeting will be schedule at the transaction closing location center

Offer is affordable at an interest rate of 3% for 15 years, while the
moratorium (Grace period) is 36 months; but before we can proceed with the
loan, you should send to us your project summary (Description) for
evaluation by the investors and how much money you need as loan to execute
the project.

Therefore, if you are interested kindly forward to me the project profile/
summary we have to deal with and how much is needed as a loan to fund the
project.

Finally 1% commission fee is paid to brokers/ agent who introduce project
owners for funding and any other opportunities, we would be delighted to
work with you if you are interested in our loan

Send to me your WhatsApp enabling telephone number for easy communication

I look forward to your response.
Best regards
Paul Macdonald

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul Macdonald,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing information about your loan offer. I appreciate your willingness to assist with both corporate and personal loans. However, before I proceed further, I have a few questions.

1. Can you please provide more details about the interest rate for the loan? Is it fixed or variable? And what is the repayment period?

2. Are there any specific requirements or qualifications that need to be met in order to be eligible for the loan?

3. Could you please explain the process of project evaluation by the investors? How long does it usually take for a project to be approved?

4. What kind of collateral or security is required for obtaining the loan?

5. Is there any flexibility in terms of repayment options? For example, can I make early repayments without any penalties?

I look forward to your response and further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: ATTENTION: TIANA (LOAN)
body:

Thanks for your email and your interest in our loan offer. Apology for my
late response. I was indisposed

Procedures to apply for the loan

subject: Re: ATTENTION: TIANA (LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul Macdonald,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing information about your loan offer. I appreciate your willingness to assist with both corporate and personal loans. However, before proceeding further, I would like to ask a few questions to better understand the terms and conditions.

1. What is the minimum and maximum loan amount that you offer?
2. Could you please provide more details about the interest rate? Is it fixed or variable?
3. Are there any additional fees or charges associated with the loan?
4. How long does the loan approval process usually take?
5. Can you share some examples of successful projects that have been funded through your company?

I look forward to receiving your response and learning more about how we can potentially work together.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Marion,

Thanks for your email and your prompt response. You are free to ask
questions where you are not clear. This is the way we can be on the same
page.  Below is my answers to your questions



i the interest rate is 3% and the repayment period is 15 years

2. The eligibility is that the project must be genuine and viable. Once the
project is viable and has a good return on investment it is good to go.

3. Maximum of five days

4. The company insurance will take care of that

5. There is flexibility in terms of repayment. You can pay earlier than the
normal due date without any penalty. All you need to do is to apply for
variation.

6. The minimum amount US5M while the maximum amount is US$1Billion depend
on the viability of the project

Send to me your Whatsapp enabling phone number for detail explanation
Best regards

Paul Macdonald

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul Macdonald,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to answer my questions. Could you please provide more information about the interest rate? What is the specific percentage that would be applied to the loan?

Regarding the repayment period, you mentioned it is in years. Could you clarify how many years exactly?

You mentioned that the project must be genuine and viable. How do you determine if a project meets these criteria? Are there any specific requirements or qualifications that need to be met?

You also mentioned that the company insurance will take care of something, but I'm not sure what exactly you are referring to. Could you please elaborate on this?

In terms of repayment, you mentioned that there is flexibility and no penalty for early payment. That sounds great! Can you explain how the variation process works? Is there any paperwork involved or is it a simple request?

Lastly, could you provide some examples of minimum and maximum loan amounts based on project viability? It would help me understand better.

I don't feel comfortable sharing my WhatsApp number at this point, but I'm happy to continue our conversation via email.

Thank you again for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Marion,

Thanks for your email and your prompt response.

Regarding your questions, I have told you in my previous email that the
interest rate is 3% for 15years while the grace period is 36 months. I
don't think it will be wise for me to tell you our mode of determining
whether a project is genuine or not. Just leave that to us. If you have a
project send it for our review. Like I told before, the repayment is
flexible and it doesn't require any rigorous paper work. It is just a
simple request back up with an application for variation. What the investor
is interested in is getting his money back. Note that our dealings with
clients are very confidential; we do not divulge official secrets to
anybody. If you are interested in the loan, you should follow the
operational procedures in my previous email and every detail you need to
know will be stated in the loan agreement for your review. Nobody is
compelling you to do anything to the contrary. Send your telephone number
for easy communication. I am a very busy person, it will better we continue
our communication through the telephone where it is necessary
Best regards

Paul Macdonald

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul Macdonald,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your prompt response. Could you please clarify what the interest rate is and what the grace period entails? I am interested in learning more about the project review process. How long does it typically take for a project to be reviewed, and what criteria are considered during the evaluation?

I understand the importance of confidentiality in financial matters. Could you explain more about the repayment flexibility and how it differs from traditional loan structures? Additionally, I would like to know more about the variation required for backing up a loan request.

I will refrain from asking about the genuineness of projects and trust your expertise in assessing them. However, could you elaborate on how investors ensure their funds are protected throughout the lending process?

I am open to discussing further details over the phone as suggested. Please let me know a convenient time to connect.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Marion



Thanks for your email and your questions



As I have explained to you for the umpteenth time, the interest rate is 3%
and the grace period is 36 months. The grace period or Moratorium as it is
called, is the period you will be allowed to carry out your investment
without repayment of the loan. After the expiration of this period you will
start paying the loan. I have equally explained this before. I don't know
why you are going back and forth. Is it that you don't digest my email very
well? I can't be repeating myself all the time. This is unethical and
unprofessional. The review period is a maximum of 5days. Note that our
criteria is political and economic stability of the country where the
project is located and it must have a good return on investment.

There is not much difference in the traditional loan structure. The
variation is a simple application to let the investors know you will be
paying your loan before the due date. Very simple matter. What the investor
is interested in, is paying the loan as at when due or before the due date.
Investors don't need a defaulter.



Investor ensuring his investment is protected is very simple. The loan
agreement takes care of this. The loan agreement protects both the investor
and the borrower. If you are interested in the loan, follow the procedures
and wait for the loan agreement, every detail is there. The investor is not
foolish to throw his money away.



I cannot give you time that is convenient for me for the call because I
don't know the country you are domiciled. Send  to me your Whatsapp
enabling telephone number I will call you
Best regards

Paul Macdonald

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul Macdonald,

Thank you for your detailed explanation regarding the interest rate, grace period, and loan structure. I appreciate your patience in clarifying these details for me. Could you please provide more information about the criteria for political and economic stability that you mentioned? I am curious to learn more about how these factors are evaluated for potential investments.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Marion

 Thanks for your email and your response. Any more questions will attract a
fee because I do not see you as somebody who needs it. If you want to learn
the job, you should come out clean. I will be ready to assist you provided
you are ready to pay my professional fees.

 Regarding your question, what I mean by political and economic stability
is that the country where the project is situated must be free from civil
strife, civil unrest and civil war and the economy of the country must be
buoyant and the inflation rate reduced to the barest minimum. Note that
investment cannot grow where we have all these factors enumerated above.
Inflation impacts stock prices because it affects how much consumers spend.
When the cost of goods or services increases, consumers are less
Best regards

Paul Macdonald

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul Macdonald,

Thank you for your detailed explanation regarding political and economic stability in relation to investments. It's interesting to learn about how factors like civil strife and inflation rates can impact investment growth. Could you provide more examples or scenarios where these factors have influenced investment decisions?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body: Stop wasting your time. I have no time for this nonsense

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
I understand your concern, but I believe this information could be valuable to you. Can I share more details with you?

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Go ahead and share the details
Best regards

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Hello! I have some exciting information to share with you about a fantastic opportunity to make money from home. Have you ever considered starting your own online business?

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Please share the information my friend.  I want to hear the exciting
business info. Making money online from home is fantastic
Best regards
Paul

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Hello Paul! I'd love to share some exciting business information with you. Making money online from home can indeed be fantastic. What specifically are you interested in learning more about? Feel free to ask any questions you may have!

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Hello Paul! I'd love to hear more about the exciting business information you have. Making money online from home does sound fantastic. Can you tell me more about how it works?

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Marion,

Thanks for your email and your prompt response.  You are still repeating
yourself. I have told you I am ready to receive any information regarding
the online business. Go ahead and explain to me what you want me to do to
earn money from home. I embrace the ideal because it is good but it seems
you are beating around the bush about it. I do not have any particular
business in mind but the one you already have in mind to share with me.

Finally, I wish to let you know that I have no patience for situations like
this but the only reason I keep the communication going is because of your
level of intellect. You are very sound and you asked intelligent questions.
Please don't give me hope where there is no hope. We can still remain good
friends. God has a reason for everything.

Have a great weekend and God bless
Best regards
Paul

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul,

Thank you for your email and for expressing your interest in earning money from home through an online business. I appreciate your willingness to learn more about the opportunity.

I completely understand your eagerness to get straight to the point, so let me explain how this online business works. Essentially, it involves leveraging digital platforms to promote products or services and earn commissions for successful sales or referrals. It's a flexible way to generate income without the need for a traditional office setup.

If you're open to exploring this further, I can provide you with more details on how to get started and support you along the way. Feel free to ask any questions you may have, and I'll be happy to assist.

Best wishes,
Marion

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Marion,

Thanks for your message. For your information, I am very open to exploring
it further.  Go ahead and give me the details. From the details I will be
able to ask questions. For now, what is the name of the product and how
acceptable is the product globally?

Finally , I have to thank you for willing to assist me in this endeavour. I
am counting on your support.
Have a great weekend
Best regards
Paul

subject: Re: ATTENTION: MARION ( LOAN)
body:
Dear Paul,

Thank you for reaching out and showing interest in exploring further details. I appreciate your willingness to assist me in this endeavor. Could you please provide more information about the product, such as its name and how widely accepted it is globally? I look forward to learning more so that I can ask relevant questions.

Wishing you a great weekend ahead!

Best wishes,
Marion
